ComicInfo.Title: Penny Century; Fire Water; La Pantera Negra; Hopey Hop Sacks
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ray has moved to a new town (Hollywood?) where he doesn't know anyone and doesn't fit in. He soliloquizes about the past, his sporadic sexual encounters with Penny Century and how he had fallen for her, plus his failed relationships with Danita Lincoln and Margarita Chascarrillo.
Two cowboys get drunk, stagger home through the desert, and encounter a devil.
Maggie is working for Negra's mom, doing paperwork, and chauffering Negra.
Norma (Negra's mom) catches Negra roaming the streets with her girlfriends, and takes her back home in a temper. Norma then talks things over with Maggie.
Hopey, in the bath, tells Maggie over the phone about Guy Goforth asking her out.
Child discovers what the inside of the earth looks like.
